text: Brrda rx sul khxng phwk khea di klaw wa “mi kar sngsay nı xallxhˌ phra phu srang chan fa thanghlay læa phændin kranan hrux? Phraxngkh thrng reiyk rxng phwk than pheux thrng yk thosʹ nı khwam phid khxng phwk than læa thrng phxnphan phwk than cnkrathang thung wara thi thuk kahnd wi” phwk khea klaw wa “phwk than michı xun dı nxkcak pen puthuchn yeiyng rea phwk than prasngkh thi ca kidkan phwk rea cak sing thi brrphburusʹ khxng phwk rea khey khearph bucha dangnan phwk than cng na hlakthan xan chad cæng ma hı phwk rea si”
